SELECT R.RESTAURANT_NO, RESTAURANT_CODE_NO, LOCAL_NO, MEMBER_NO, R.FILE_NO, RESTAURANT_NAME, RESTAURANT_DES, RESTAURANT_ADD1, RESTAURANT_ADD2, RESTAURANT_TEL, R.DELYN, RESTAURANT_X, RESTAURANT_Y, R.CREATE_DATE, RF.FILE_NO, RF.RESTAURANT_NO, F.FILE_NO, FILE_SN, FILE_PATH, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_SAVE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, F.CREATE_DATE, F.DELYN FROM RESTAURANT R LEFT JOIN RESTAURANT_FILE RF ON(R.RESTAURANT_NO = RF.RESTAURANT_NO) LEFT JOIN FILES F ON (RF.FILE_NO = F.FILE_NO) WHERE 1 = 1
AND R.DELYN = 'N'
AND R.RESTAURANT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchVo.restaurantName}||'%'
AND R.RESTAURANT_ADD1 LIKE '%'||#{searchVo.restaurantAdd1}||'%'
AND RESTAURANT_CODE_NO = #{searchVo.restaurantCodeNo}
AND MEMBER_NO = #{searchVo.memberNo}
ORDER BY R.RESTAURANT_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} * 10 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT R.RESTAURANT_NO, R.RESTAURANT_CODE_NO, R.LOCAL_NO, R.MEMBER_NO, R.FILE_NO, R.RESTAURANT_NAME, R.RESTAURANT_DES, R.RESTAURANT_ADD1, R.RESTAURANT_ADD2, R.RESTAURANT_TEL, R.DELYN, R.RESTAURANT_X, R.RESTAURANT_Y, R.CREATE_DATE, F.FILE_NO, F.FILE_SAVE_NAME FROM RESTAURANT R JOIN RESTAURANT_FILE RF ON (R.RESTAURANT_NO = RF.RESTAURANT_NO) JOIN FILES F ON (F.FILE_NO = RF.FILE_NO) WHERE R.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo}
